item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，软银和 OpenAI 将在大阪前夏普 LCD 工厂联合运营人工智能代理公司
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周五报道，软银计划将日本一家前夏普液晶面板工厂改造成一个数据中心，用于运行与美国 ChatGPT 开发商 OpenAI 合作开发的人工智能代理。【原文：SoftBank plans to transform a former Sharp LCD panel plant in Japan into a data center for operating artificial intelligence agents developed in collaboration with U.S.-based ChatGPT creator, OpenAI, according to a Nikkei report on Friday.】

item.title: 标准普尔 500 指数调整的六张图表
item.description: 一年多来，美国股市首次出现调整。现在的问题是，下滑是否会变得更加严重。【原文：For the first time in over a year, the U.S. stock market is in a correction. The question now is whether the slide is set to get worse.】

item.title: 特斯拉称可能成为报复性关税的目标
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的特斯拉公司在给美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）的一封信中表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战可能使特斯拉成为美国报复性关税的目标。【原文：Elon Musk's Tesla said in a letter to the US trade representative Jamieson Greer that President Donald Trump's trade war could make it a target for retaliatory tariffs against the U.S.】

item.title: 燃料短缺影响收成，玻利维亚豆农人心惶惶
item.description: 在玻利维亚的圣克鲁斯农场地区，日益严重的燃料短缺开始影响农民收割庄稼的能力，这也是这个农业已成为主要经济驱动力的南美国家所担忧的问题。【原文：In Bolivia's farm region of Santa Cruz, a worsening fuel shortage is starting to hit farmers' ability to harvest their crops, a concern for the embattled South American country where agriculture has become a key economic driver.】

item.title: 在关税之争中，通用汽车首席执行官周三会见特朗普 -- 白宫
item.description: 一位白宫官员告诉路透社，唐纳德-特朗普总统周三会见了通用汽车公司首席执行官玛丽-巴拉（Mary Barra），在关税战持续不断的情况下讨论了这家汽车制造商的投资计划。【原文：President Donald Trump met with General Motors CEO Mary Barra on Wednesday to talk about the automaker's investment plans amid an ongoing tariff war, a White House official told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国财政部确认俄罗斯能源融资许可证到期
item.description: 美国财政部周四证实，根据乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统任期最后几天实施的严厉制裁措施，允许与俄罗斯金融机构停止能源交易的许可本周如期到期。【原文：The U.S. Treasury on Thursday confirmed that a license allowing a wind-down of energy transactions with Russian financial institutions expired as scheduled this week under stiff sanctions imposed in the final days of Joe Biden's presidency.】

item.title: 摩根大通工程师使用编码助手后效率跃升 20
item.description: 摩根大通全球首席信息官 Lori Beer 说，摩根大通数以万计的软件工程师通过使用该银行开发的编码助手工具提高了效率，交付产品的速度提高了 10%至 20%。【原文：Tens of thousands of JPMorgan Chase software engineers increased their efficiency, delivering products 10% to 20% faster by using a coding assistant tool developed by the bank, its global chief information officer Lori Beer said.】

item.title: 法国央行行长：特朗普的经济政策是美国经济的悲剧
item.description: 法国欧洲中央银行（ECB）决策者弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）周四表示，特朗普政府领导下的美国目前的经济发展对全球经济是一个负面冲击，但首先对美国经济是一个负面冲击。【原文：Current economic developments in the United States under the Trump administration are a negative shock for the global economy but above all for the U.S. economy, French European Central Bank (ECB) policymaker Francois Villeroy de Galhau said on Thursday.】

item.title: 据 Blooomberg News 报道，阿联酋将推动更容易获得美国芯片技术
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，阿拉伯联合酋长国的一位高级官员计划访问华盛顿，要求更容易获得美国的技术，并讨论在美国的投资问题。【原文：A top United Arab Emirates official plans to visit Washington to press for easier access to American technology and discuss investment in the United States, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，安联牵头的财团将于下周完成价值 38 亿美元的 Viridium 收购交易
item.description: 两位业内消息人士周四称，安联牵头的财团即将赢得对德国最大寿险管理公司 Viridium 的竞购，该公司正在被金融投资者 Cinven 出售，预计下周将敲定一笔 35 亿欧元（38.0 亿美元）的交易。【原文：An Allianz-led consortium is close to winning a bid for Germany's largest life insurance administrator Viridium, being sold by financial investor Cinven in a 3.5 billion euros ($3.80 billion) deal expected to be finalised next week, two industry sources said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国欧盟葡萄酒进口商和零售商警告关税将导致倒闭和裁员
item.description: 销售法国香槟和意大利葡萄酒的美国进口商、分销商和零售商告诉路透社，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对欧洲酒精饮料征收 200% 的关税将对他们造成沉重打击。【原文：U.S. importers, distributors and retailers selling French champagne and Italian wines told Reuters that U.S. President Donald Trump's threatened 200% tariff on European alcoholic drinks would hit them hard.】

item.title: D-Wave 发布乐观预测后，量子计算公司股价大涨
item.description: 在 D-Wave Quantum 预测季度营收强于预期之后，一些量子计算公司的股票周四反弹，扩大了上一交易日的涨幅，与大盘走势背道而驰。【原文：Shares of some quantum computing companies rallied on Thursday, adding to gains from the previous session and bucking the broader market's trend after D-Wave Quantum forecast stronger-than-expected quarterly revenue.】

item.title: 巴西推举皮埃特罗-门德斯连任巴西国家石油公司董事长
item.description: 巴西国营石油公司（Petrobras）周四表示，巴西政府已提名皮特罗-门德斯（Pietro Mendes）担任新一届董事长，这是该公司收到的股东提名的董事会成员之一。【原文：Brazilian state-run oil firm Petrobras said on Thursday that the Brazilian government has put forward Pietro Mendes for a new term as chairman, among the board members nominations from its shareholders that the company has received.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利研究认为 2025 年上半年并购活动将在波动中放缓
item.description: 摩根士丹利研究公司（Morgan Stanley Research）周四在一份报告中称，由于市场波动给首席执行官、董事会和计划谈判和启动交易的保荐人带来了不确定性，预计 2025 年上半年投资银行业务将放缓。【原文：Investment banking is expected to experience a slowdown in the first half of 2025 as market volatility creates uncertainty for CEOs, boards and sponsors planning to negotiate and launch deals, Morgan Stanley Research said in a note on Thursday.】

item.title: CERAWEEK 数据中心建设加剧了对美国最大电网负担过重的担忧
item.description: 本周在休斯顿举行的 CERAWeek 会议上，能源高管和监管者表示，人工智能数据中心的快速发展正在加剧人们对美国老化的电网能否满足这一需求的担忧。【原文：The rapid development of AI data centers is intensifying concerns about how well an aging U.S. electrical grid can hold up to that demand, energy executives and regulators said at the CERAWeek conference in Houston this week.】

item.title: 中国船东组织称美国港口费提案违反世贸组织规则和美国法律
item.description: 路透社周四看到的一份声明称，中国船东协会反对美国向拥有或已从中国订购船只的远洋货运公司征收高额入港费的提议，认为这违反了国际规则和美国法律。【原文：The China Shipowners' Association opposes a U.S. proposal to slap hefty port entry fees on ocean cargo carriers that own or have ordered vessels from China, saying it violates international rules and U.S. laws, according to a statement seen by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: Kering 任命 Demna 为 Gucci 艺术总监
item.description: 意大利奢侈品牌古驰（Gucci）的所有者开云集团（Kering）周四表示，古驰已任命格鲁吉亚设计师德姆纳（Demna）为艺术总监，以重振其陷入困境的旗舰品牌，阻止销售下滑。【原文：Italian luxury brand Gucci has appointed Georgian designer Demna as its artistic director, owner Kering said on Thursday, as it tries to revitalise its struggling flagship label and stop a slide in sales.】

item.title: 阿尔巴尼亚开始关闭 TikTok，关注青少年暴力问题
item.description: 由于担心社交媒体助长校内外的青少年暴力，阿尔巴尼亚政府周四开始实施为期一年的禁令，TikTok 用户在访问这款流行的短视频应用时遇到了困难。【原文：TikTok users in Albania are experiencing difficulties accessing the popular short video app after a one-year government ban took effect on Thursday, prompted by concerns that social media is fuelling youth violence in and outside school.】

item.title: Cucinelli 预计 2024 年营业利润增长 13%，并确认了指导目标
item.description: 意大利奢侈品集团布鲁内罗-库奇内利（Brunello Cucinelli）周四表示，去年其营业利润增长了 12.9%，并确认了 2025 年和 2026 年销售额增长约 10%的预期。【原文：Italian luxury group Brunello Cucinelli on Thursday said its operating profit had risen 12.9% last year and confirmed expectations for sales growth of around 10% in 2025 and 2026.】

item.title: 第四季度美国股市推动家庭财富创历史新高
item.description: 美联储周四的数据显示，美国家庭财富在2024年底升至历史新高，这要归功于股市在过去三周内似乎已经力竭的涨势。【原文：U.S. household wealth rose to a fresh record high at the end of 2024, Federal Reserve data showed on Thursday, thanks to a stock market rally that appears to have run out of steam in the past three weeks.】

item.title: 新闻集团被谷歌搜索引擎竞争对手 Brave Software 起诉
item.description: 新闻集团已被谷歌搜索引擎竞争对手 Brave Software 起诉，该公司试图阻止鲁珀特-默多克（Rupert Murdoch）的公司因读者被引导至《华尔街日报》和《纽约邮报》的版权文章而提起诉讼。【原文：News Corp has been sued by Google search engine rival Brave Software, which seeks to forestall a lawsuit by Rupert Murdoch's company for when readers are directed to copyrighted articles from the Wall Street Journal and New York Post.】

item.title: 前空中客车公司老板敦促欧洲快速推动制造武装机器人
item.description: 这位前空中客车公司负责人敦促欧洲暂时将注意力从大型军备项目转移到机器人无人机等灵活的新技术上，以便向莫斯科和华盛顿证明，欧洲能够在本十年末为其安全做出贡献。【原文：The former head of Airbus has urged Europe to shift attention for now from major arms projects to nimble new technologies like robotic drones to demonstrate to Moscow and Washington that it can make a difference to its security by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 加拿大就美国钢铝关税向世贸组织提出争端申诉
item.description: 加拿大贸易机构周四表示，加拿大已就美国对来自加拿大的某些钢铁和铝产品征收进口关税一事请求与美国进行世贸组织争端磋商。【原文：Canada has requested WTO dispute consultations with the U.S. over its imposition of import duties on certain steel and aluminium products from Canada, the trade body said on Thursday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，英美资源集团计划进一步裁员
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，英美资源集团正计划在其公司办公室裁减更多的工作岗位，该公司旨在将业务重心重新放在铜和铁矿石开采上的更广泛重组正在顺利进行。【原文：Anglo American is planning to cut more jobs at its corporate office, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, as a broader restructuring aimed at refocusing the miner's operations on copper and iron ore mining is well under way.】

item.title: 美国金融业监管局勒令 Stifel 向美国家庭支付 1.325 亿美元赔偿金
item.description: 金融业监管局仲裁小组责令 Stifel Financial 向一个家庭支付 1.325 亿美元，原因是该公司虚假陈述了复杂结构性票据的风险，造成了他们的律师所说的 "惊人 "损失。【原文：Stifel Financial was ordered by a Financial Industry Regulatory Authority arbitration panel to pay a family $132.5 million for misrepresenting the risk of complex structured notes, causing what their lawyer called "staggering" losses.】

item.title: 韩国 NH Venture 公司关注对以色列科技初创企业的投资
item.description: 韩国 NH 风险投资公司首席执行官表示，该公司正寻求向以色列科技公司投资数百万美元，力求将以色列的独创性与韩国的制造能力结合起来，打造更大规模的公司。【原文：Korea's NH Venture Investment is looking to invest millions of dollars in Israeli tech firms, its chief executive said, seeking to combine Israeli ingenuity with Korean manufacturing prowess to build larger companies.】

item.title: 韩国 NH Venture 公司关注对以色列科技初创企业的投资
item.description: 韩国 NH 风险投资公司首席执行官表示，该公司正寻求向以色列科技公司投资数百万美元，力求将以色列的独创性与韩国的制造能力结合起来，打造更大规模的公司。【原文：Korea's NH Venture Investment is looking to invest millions of dollars in Israeli tech firms, its chief executive said, seeking to combine Israeli ingenuity with Korean manufacturing prowess to build larger companies.】

item.title: 美联储打破惯例，尚未公布 2024 年财务报告
item.description: 美联储今年打破了长期以来每年发布前一年财务状况预告的惯例。【原文：The Federal Reserve has broken this year with its long-standing practice of releasing an annual preview of its finances for the preceding year.】

item.title: 数据显示，阿联酋对美国的铝出口在特朗普加征关税前大幅增长
item.description: 美国商务部的数据显示，阿拉伯联合酋长国对美国的铝出口在3月份的前11天猛增，因为买家在美国关税于周三生效前囤积了来自其第二大供应商的货物。【原文：United Arab Emirates exports of aluminium to the U.S. jumped in the first 11 days of March, data from the U.S. Department of Commerce showed, as buyers stocked up on shipments from their second-biggest supplier before the U.S. tariffs took effect on Wednesday.】

item.title: 多娜泰拉-范思哲的大胆设想让品牌在詹尼遇害后一直备受瞩目
item.description: 多娜泰拉-范思哲（Donatella Versace）在其兄长詹尼（Gianni）近三十年前遇害后帮助确保了家族时装帝国的生存，她将辞去品牌首席设计师一职。【原文：Donatella Versace, who helped to ensure the survival of the family fashion empire after the killing of her brother Gianni almost three decades ago, is to step down as the brand's chief designer, its owner announced on Thursday.】
